meta_title: Inventory Turnover Ratio Formula: MRO & Industrial Guide
meta_description: Is your storeroom a graveyard for capital? The inventory turnover ratio formula reveals if you're overstocked or risking a stockout. Optimize your MRO turns
title: How to Use the Inventory Turnover Ratio Formula to Optimize Industrial MRO Performance

hero_image.alt: Hero image for How to Use the Inventory Turnover Ratio Formula to Optimize Industrial MRO Performance

image_prompt: A professional, photo-realistic wide shot of a modern, highly organized industrial MRO storeroom in 2026. In the foreground, a diverse team of two maintenance professionals (one male, one female) wearing clean navy blue work uniforms, hard hats, and safety glasses are reviewing a tablet (only the back of the tablet is visible). They are standing near high-density industrial shelving units filled with neatly labeled gears, motors, and boxed components. The lighting is bright and clean, reflecting a high-tech manufacturing environment. In the background, a glimpse of a clean factory floor with a conveyor system is visible through an open bay door. No text or displays are visible. Full-body shots of the professionals.
